meanings.sent1: The rain queered our picnic plans.
meanings.sent2: The spilled milk queered the recipe.
meanings.sent3: His mischievous dog queered the surprise party by eating the cake.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected delay queered our chances of arriving on time.
meanings.sent5: The torn map queered our hiking adventure.

meanings.definition: To make something or someone appear suspicious or odd
meanings.sent1: The strange noise queered the peaceful atmosphere of the forest.
meanings.sent2: His peculiar behavior queered our trust in him.
meanings.sent3: The missing keys queered the mystery of the locked room.
meanings.sent4: The flickering lights queered the mood of the horror movie.
meanings.sent5: The unexplained footprints queered the investigation.

meanings.definition: To make something or someone appear homosexual or non-heteronormative
meanings.sent1: The flamboyant outfit queered his traditional appearance.
meanings.sent2: Her unique hairstyle queered the conservative event.
meanings.sent3: The rainbow flag queered the otherwise monochrome parade.
meanings.sent4: The inclusive language queered the outdated norms.
meanings.sent5: The supportive community queered the idea of isolation.
